content: I do not have personal experiences or favorites as humans do. however, it's popularly known that new orleans has many restaurants that serve delicious jambalaya. some of the most famous places to try it are commander's palace, dooky chase, and k-paul's louisiana kitchen. there are also several places in the french quarter, such as coop's place and gumbo shop, that serve excellent jambalaya. you can also try it from street vendors or local cafes, where you can experience the authentic creole flavor.
